entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Retry `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore.Test.ProtectedUserStoreTest.PhoneFactorFailsAfterSecurityStampChangeTest` #58231
  • OpenApi Enums generating no schema #58230
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, fortunes, plaintext #58227
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #58226
  • Per file size limit in multipart form #58225
  • RegistryXmlRepository Does Not Dispose Registry Key #58224
  • Exception is raised in when setting interactivemode in blazor server authentication type enabled web app project #58222
  • OpenAPI ArgumentNullException for type parameter when using versioned route #58219
  • Allow the configuration of ServiceProviderOptions when using the WebApplicationBuilder #58217
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, json, json #58216
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #58215
  • Bootstrap 5.3.3 upgrade breaks Blazor template styling #58214
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Loading progress .svg in the default Blazor template causes a Cumulative Layout Shift on the <body> tag #57212
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Azure B2C login issue with Blazor Webassembly #58223
  • Benchmark stopped running: QueryCompilation #58203
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #58210
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi should allow overriding the schema for specific types #56448
    9.0.0
  • Support multiple response types with the same status code in ApiExplorer #55412
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add retry for test Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore.Test.ProtectedUserStoreTest.PhoneFactorFailsAfterSecurityStampChangeTest #58232
  • [release/8.0] Update the Microsoft.Identity.Web versions used by project templates #58229
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Update the Microsoft.Identity.Web versions used by project templates #58228
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.x
  • Descriptive Error for Improper Use of [AsParameters] #56114 #58218
    community-contribution

Merged

  • Perf improvement: Fix Cumulative Layout Shift issue in blank Blazor templates #57213
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • Avoid unnecessary HealthStatus comparison #58176
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Fix Prefix Matching Logic in PrefixContainer #58068
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • Using Interlocked in InputFlowControl and Http2Stream #57968
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add registry search for upgrade policy keys #58095
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Enable signing on Non-Windows builds #58191
    area-infrastructure
  • Use ImpersonationToken for IIS Windows Auth #58041
    feature-iis, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Run static code analysis on IIS #58167
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Add Description to ProducesResponseType (and others) for better OpenAPI document creation #58193
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-networking
  • [Templates][Identity] Update jquery-validation to 1.20.0 #58173
    area-mvc
  • Bump rollup from 4.18.1 to 4.22.4 #58049
    area-infrastructure, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Add public method to QuickGrid to close column options UI #57904
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-rtm.24479.2 #58153
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Add source generator to emit public Program class definition #58199
    area-infrastructure, area-minimal
  • ApiExplorer Support for HttpResults types for Controllers #57464
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
